summary: This header file defines version-related constants and macros for the Apache HTTP Server, including copyright information, product names, and version numbers. It provides standardized version strings used throughout the server for identification in HTTP headers and logs.

logs.reason: This copyright information may appear in server identification headers or version information logs.
This version string is used to identify the server in HTTP headers and potentially in logs.
Full server version information that may appear in HTTP headers or logs for identification purposes.
